metadata.title: Les œuvres de Jacques Callot
metadata.creator: Delaunay, Pierre,18th cent
Delaunay, Pierre, 18th cent
Callot, Jacques, 1592-1635. Works
metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez De Launay libraire, ruë S. Jacque, à la ville de Rome, près la Fontaine de S. Severin
metadata.description: Prospectus for an unrealized postumous edition of Callot's etchings, which were to have been pulled from plates that Jacques Fagnani acquired from Israël Sylvestre's son-in-law, Nicole Petit de Loigny

"La souscription entiere [est] de quatre cens cinquante livres ... Les souscripteurs seront reçûes chez le sieur De Launay libraire ... Il commencera à délivrer le premier volume au mois de decembre prochain"--P. 2, second sequence
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
